column1: My Name is Sushmita Sen. I live at 6th Floor, Beach Queen, Yari Road, Versova, Andheri West, Mumbai. My mobile number is 7878249657 and email id is sushmita.sen@gmail.com. I have to raise an compaint in "Support" department about the purchased Television from Samsung. The product worked well for only 3 weeks after purchase date. There were intense sparks and after that, television stopped working. Reason of Complaint: "Issue with Product". Order Number is 851513212. Feedback is Average and agreeing to terms and conditions.

My Name is Hrithik Roshan born on 10 January 1974, Male. I live at Mannat Apartments, 161, Balasaheb Sawant Rd, Gharkul Society, Four Bungalows, Andheri West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400047. My mobile number is 9849604886 and email id is teamhrithikroshan@gmail.com. I have to raise an compaint in "Billing" department about the purchased MS office subscription. Inspite of providing correct product key, MS office is not accepting it. Please resolve it asap. Reason of Complaint: "Issue with Payment". Order Number is 5646541532. Feedback is Poor and agreeing to terms and conditions.

My Name is Shah Rukh Khan born on 02 November 1965, Male. I live at Mannat, Land's End, Bandstand, Bandra (West), Mumbai, Maharashtra - 400050. My mobile number is 5559960321 and email id is srkfans@redchillies.com. I have to raise an compaint in "Billing" department about the recent visit to Mariotte hotel. Inspite of pre-booking couple days before, the staff asked for the payment details citing that their online record do not shows our registration. Reason of Complaint: "Issue with Payment". Order Number is 897456246844.  Feedback is Poor and agreeing to terms and conditions.
